citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1055 am on
1/15/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking at the door, honking the horn, calling
the phone number on the account, and waiting 30 minutes at the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals,
and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1055 am on 
1/15/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking at the door, honking the horn, calling 
the phone number on the account, and waiting 30 minutes at the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, 
and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
